code:
sequenceDiagram
actor Dev
participant GitHub
participant Runner
Dev->>GitHub: triggers "Codebase Mindmap"
GitHub->>Runner: dispatch
loop Codebase Mindmap
Runner->>Runner: job build
Runner-->>Runner: Checkout
Runner-->>Runner: Setup Node.js
Runner-->>Runner: Install markmap-cli
Runner-->>Runner: Generate Markdown map
Runner-->>Runner: Build Markmap HTML
Runner-->>Runner: Upload artifact (Security_OAuth2)
Runner-->>Runner: Upload Pages artifact
Runner->>Runner: job deploy
Runner-->>Runner: Deploy to GitHub Pages
end

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 这里必须包含 Security_OAuth2 这一块。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'Security_OAuth2'？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]

extra.repo_description: DMARRSS - Decentralized Machine Assisted Rapid Response Security System, leveraging LLM-inspired architecture and neural networks to detect, prioritize, and respond to threat events in distributed sys
